name: Create Jira Issue Success
description: Verify the agent follows the multi-step process to fetch issue types and then create a new issue.

input.prompt: Create a new Jira issue with the summary 'Bug: UI alignment issue'. First, use the scripts/get-issue-types.js script to find the correct issue type ID, then use the nango-mcp-server_create_issue tool to create the issue in project 10001. Return the confirmation of the created issue.
